title: 2012 election : support for Romney and Obama , by ethnic group
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Obama, and Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Black.
Among all the Races, Romney had the highest SOME LABEL 59.0 in Race White (non-Hispanic) and lowest value 5.0 in Race Black.
The maximum SOME LABEL for Romney that was found in Race White (non-Hispanic) was 11.8 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Black.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Obama, and Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Race Black, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL 90.0 among the 2 groups and in Black, Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL 5.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Obama, and Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Black.
Among all the Races, Romney had the highest SOME LABEL 59.0 in Race White (non-Hispanic) and lowest value 5.0 in Race Black.
The maximum SOME LABEL for Romney that was found in Race White (non-Hispanic) was 11.8 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Black.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Obama, and Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Race Black had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for Obama. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Race Black for Romney.
Among all the Races, Romney had the highest SOME LABEL 59.0 in Race White (non-Hispanic) and lowest value 5.0 in Race Black.
Race White (non-Hispanic) and Black had the biggest gap of 54.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Romney.
Among the groups, Obama had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 2.43 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
On average, the Race White (non-Hispanic) had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups Obama, and Romney. Whereas Nonwhite had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
